sentences.en: Because it was his first offence , the punishment wasn't too severe.
sentences.cn: 由于他是初犯, 惩罚较轻.

sentences.en: Dad, you need a bath. No offence.
sentences.cn: 爸爸，别见怪，不过你该洗澡了。

sentences.en: Don’t be upset by what he said; he meant no offence (= did not intend to offend anyone ).
sentences.cn: 不要为他的话而生气，他并没有冒犯谁的意思。

sentences.en: Germany still has no insider-dealing offence in its statute books.
sentences.cn: 德国的法律条文中仍未设立内幕交易罪。

sentences.en: He suggested that tangling fishing gear should be made a criminal offence.
sentences.cn: 他提议，缠绕捕鱼器材应该算刑事犯罪。

sentences.en: His solicitor said he committed the offence because he was heavily in debt.
sentences.cn: 他的律师说他犯罪是因为欠下巨债。

sentences.en: I agree with the theorem that the best defence is offence.
sentences.cn: 我同意最好的防御是进攻的理论.

sentences.en: Only later did he realize the full seriousness of his offence.
sentences.cn: 他后来才意识到他的罪行有多严重.

sentences.en: Prosecution for a first minor offence rarely leads to imprisonment.
sentences.cn: 因初犯轻罪被控者很少被判监禁。

sentences.en: She carried on merrily, not realizing the offence she was causing.
sentences.cn: 她毫无顾忌地胡闹，没意识到惹人生气了。

sentences.en: She never takes offence at anything.
sentences.cn: 什么事都不会让她生气。

sentences.en: Their behaviour is an offence. It's no laughing matter.
sentences.cn: 他们这么做是犯罪,这可不是开玩笑的.

sentences.en: They called on the authorities to make slavery a punishable offence.
sentences.cn: 他们呼吁当局将蓄奴定为一种应该受到惩罚的罪行。

sentences.en: They made him pay for his offence by giving him the sack.
sentences.cn: 他们解雇了他,从而使他因自己的过错而受到了惩罚.

sentences.en: This sentence is totally disproportionate to the alleged offence.
sentences.cn: 从所犯罪行来看，这一量刑完全不合理。

sentences.en: We apologize unreservedly for any offence we have caused.
sentences.cn: 若有得罪，我们深表歉意。

sentences.en: We believe an offence was committed under EU regulations.
sentences.cn: 我们认为根据欧盟有关规定已经构成了犯罪。

words.tran_cn: 攻击的；冒犯的；无礼的；讨厌的
犯罪，过错；进攻；触怒；引起反感的事物

trans.tran_cn: 犯罪，违反，冒犯，触怒，攻击
trans.tran_en: an illegal action or a crime
